text:
How to quickly clean a kiwi with a spoon
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Vyacheslav Lazarev
This is much faster than peeling a fruit with a knife.
Many people like kiwi for its sweet and sour taste, but not everyone likes to clean it. If you do this with a knife, you can accidentally cut off part of the pulp, and with your hands for a long time. However, there is a method that greatly simplifies this process.
What is needed

Knife;
tablespoon;
plate.

How to peel a kiwi
1. Cut the ends of the kiwi fruit on both sides.


WOL YouTube Channel - World of Lifehacks

2. Take a tablespoon and pierce the fruit in the area between the pulp and peel.


WOL YouTube Channel - World of Lifehacks

3. Then the spoon should be carefully rotated around the fruit, as shown in the photo below.


WOL YouTube Channel - World of Lifehacks

Watch the video to figure out how to do it right.



If the kiwi is too hard, you cannot clean it with a spoon. And if the fruit turns out to be very soft, it will turn into porridge. Therefore, before cleaning, we recommend that you feel the kiwi so as not to spoil it with a spoon.
